channel.title: Running error
channel.description:
When I'm running my server I sometimes get something like
[code]java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -1 at java.lang.String.substring(String.java:1938) at java.lang.String.substring(String.java:1905) at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:216) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:377) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]
What does this mean?

item.title: Running error
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:2, topic:273602”]Check those lines of those handlers.
Ex. : line 215 of commands[/quote]

Exactly, do what he said.

Read full topic

item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Check around them. See if anything is… Wrong.
